TASK: Craft an item of type: diamond_leggings
inventory=[{"type": "redstone_torch", "quantity": 37, "index": 18}, {"type": "seagrass", "quantity": 20, "index": 20}, {"type": "black_concrete_powder", "quantity": 53, "index": 31}, {"type": "diamond_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "warped_fence_gate", "quantity": 52, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft diamond_leggings I need to craft diamond first. Diamond can be crafted from diamond_block. Therefore, I will move the diamond_block to the crafting table (eg., slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 38 to slot 1 with quantity 1

thought: The diamond block has been converted to diamond. Now I will move the diamond to an empty inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 9
